content: In the days of doubt, in the days of painful brooding over the fate of my fatherland you are my only support, my only solace, oh great, mighty, true and free Russian language!
translations: ita:Nei giorni del dubbio, nei giorni di dolorosa rimuginazione sul destino della mia patria tu sei il mio unico sostegno, i
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by niceguydave (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
